snippet: The motive for an acid attack on the Bolshoi Ballet’s artistic director may partly turn on a ballerina, Anzhelina Vorontsova, who is romantically involved with another company dancer who has confessed to involvement in the attack.
abstract: Prosecutors have yet to lay out reasons for January acid attack on Bolshoi Ballet’s artistic director Sergei Filin, but motive may partly turn on Anzhelina Vorontsova, ballerina who is romantically involved with Pavel Dmitrichenko, another company dancer who has confessed to his involvement in attack.

byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and SOPHIA KISHKOVSKY

lead_paragraph: The motive for an acid attack on the Bolshoi Ballet’s artistic director may partly turn on a ballerina, Anzhelina Vorontsova, who is romantically involved with another company dancer who has confessed to involvement in the attack.

headline.seo: Ballerina May Be at Center of Bolshoi Acid Attack
